My Portfolio

Project 1

My first project using JavaScript and Bootstrap.I developed an interactive web application utilizing JavaScript and Bootstrap. The app features dynamic content updates and responsive design elements, making use of Bootstrap's pre-built components and grid system. JavaScript was employed to handle user interactions and data manipulation, enhancing the user experience with seamless and engaging functionality.

Project 2

The system uses a relational database to store and manage project data, including descriptions, images, and metadata. On the front end, I utilized a CSS framework (like Bootstrap or Tailwind CSS) to ensure a responsive, visually appealing design that adapts seamlessly across devices. This approach allowed for a clean, user-friendly interface and efficient data management, showcasing the project's scalability and design flexibility.

Project 3

In this project, I developed a secure login system for "Mangga Story" using a relational database. The system features user authentication with a login form, where credentials are validated against stored data. I employed best practices for security and user experience, including password hashing and session management, to ensure a reliable and safe login process. This project highlights my ability to integrate database management with front-end design to create a functional and user-friendly authentication system.
